title: Where can I buy Neutraface? (Other than in House Ind.)
content: Hi, I'd like to know where I could get Neutra / Neutraface typeface other than in [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820154035/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface"). I'm getting some kind of error with my credit card on that page, and I reeeaaally need that typeface. Thank you!!
author: jesellepaulino

comments.content: why not try to contact them and see if the issue can be resolved?

try clearing cookies, then try the page again. We've had some security issues that have made that an issue sometimes.

Or, call the office first thing tomorrow morning, 800-888-4390

Jason C
